name: Me and Michael
description:
This is a game made in Adam Le Doux’s Bitsy engine as a submission for the “5-Years-O-Bitsy” game jam. The theme for the jam I chose was Song, and the song I chose to base the game on is “Me and Michael” by MGMT.

This is my first ever game jam, as well as my first ever Bitsy game.  I’m quite inexperienced in both the field of game jams and Bitsy, but despite that I hope you enjoy! And as always, thank you for playing!
